pullRequest.body:
For `R` a domain, Define the equivalence between `R/RË£` and the principal ideals of `R` defined by sending the
class of `x` to the principal ideal generated by `x`.

---

nodes.body: maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.

Thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8777814015/job/24083312024)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8777814015/job/24083311667)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8777814015/job/24083311947)
Isn't the LHS `Associates R`?
And the RHS should maybe be `Subtype` instead.
Yes, indeed! It has a monoid structure so I can generalize to `equivIsPrincipal` being a MulEquiv. Thanks!

> And the RHS should maybe be `Subtype` instead.

I guess it is better to have function with values in types indeed.
RHS does not have a multiplicative structure though. Maybe make it into a `Submonoid (Ideal R)`? And it is even an ordered iso. But I couldn't find a ordered-monoid-iso structure in mathlib.
Oh right, it's the ideals that have a structure. Well, I guess that will be for another PR...
Maybe make it an order iso? And the inverse is given by `Submodule.IsPrincipal.generator`.

Yeah, I was thinking about something like that. But maybe in that case, it would be better to move all the `Submodule.IsPrincipal.generator` stuff in  so that we do not need to import `Mathlib.RingTheory.PrincipalIdealDomain` to have access to the isomorphism but the file `Ideal.Basic` is quite long already... I guess one way to solve this would be to create a `IsPrincipal` file...
Yeah but maybe for another PR.

```suggestion
noncomputable def associatesEquivIsPrincipal (R : Type*) [CommRing R] [IsDomain R] :
```
Or maybe
```suggestion
noncomputable def _root_.Associates.equivIsPrincipal (R : Type*) [CommRing R] [IsDomain R] :
```
Same below
I think I'd rather keep this def in the `Ideal` namespace, so I'll go for the first suggestion

Please change this name as well.
Also, could this be a simp lemma?
Yes, good point.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Add `Ideal.associatesEquivIsPrincipal`
